name: He Was
description:
Requires sound

Play out a eulogy from several people close to the deceased.
It's a comedy, I promise.

This game is for two very specific groups of people.
You will know if you're one of them by the end.
None of the character portrayals are directly targeted at anyone, but the game as a whole sure is.

Instructions

Left click to advance text and choose dialogue options.
Esc to quit

Credits

Music: RED RAW AGAINST THE GRAIN by hellstar.plus
Fonts: Eleven and Pleurisy by Eeve Somepx
Models: Free3D
